column5: Sorry Leafs fans but my young Pens sure are exciting to watch.   Took care of their own with the rough stuff too.

Yes unfortunitlly the leafs got smoked.We as leaf fans should have known it was going to happen.They played well the last two games so it was bound to happen.The pens in 2 or 3 years will be a great team if you ask me.   wish i was
It was ugly.  I love watching the talent on the Penguins, but Toronto is still my team.  We'll bounce back.......eventually.
they wont be the PENGUINSSSS anymore
score wouldn't be that bad everytime, if they played each other all the  time.  Thats what happens when one team is on and the other is off!
born and raised to bleed blue and white!  But man are those young kids on the pens something else to watch or what?  Could be the next great team?  Cheers!
